attributes.action: Look in to back yard breeders not the xl bully breed
attributes.additional_details: I think the pm an parliament should rethink about banning the xl bully breed and look at bringing stricter breeding laws out an really crack down on them as the backyard breeders are giving the wrong image of the dog by selling them to just anyone they can when there are loving families out there with them as lovely loving family pets just like my pug
attributes.background: As a pug dog owner I think it’s really unfair what ur doing by banning the xl bully as I have met hundreds of lovely loving ones and it will affect millions of families with small children that are attached to there loving pet it’s not the breed it’s the backyard breeders using them as Cash cows

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for similar actions: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643033
Require anyone who breeds dogs to have a licence

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully
